info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 7:46AM EDT until June 16 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN LIVINGSTON AND NORTHERN WASHTENAW COUNTIES... At 745 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brighton to near South Lyon to near Whitmore Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... South Lyon around 750 AM EDT. Salem around 755 AM EDT. Canton around 805 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Hudson Mills, Lakeland, Plainfield, Lyndon Township, Hudson Mills Metropark, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Chilson, Delhi Mills, Barton Hills and Unadilla. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
